title: is there any scientific evidence for crystal lamps sending out good vibes?
body:
http://ww1.prweb.com/prfiles/2004/12/05/185974/Home_page_image.jpg

my mother has several of these in our house

i was asking why she leaves them on at night since she doesn't like sleeping with lights on and she said it's because it sends out 'good energy.'

i know what she was implying here, like good vibes, that sort of thing, does anyone know of scientific evidence for this though? just curious cause it seems fishy to me
